item.title: Pesticide Tragedy Raichur: 3 Die After Eating Contaminated Vegetables
item.description:
<![CDATA[3 die after eating veggies sprayed with pesticide
The victims have been identified as Ramesh Nayak (38) and his daughters Nagamma (8) and Deepa (6). Nayak's wife Padma (35) has been admitted to Raichur Institute of Medical Sciences....]]>
